author: jvanzyl
msg: - modified ant task for executing arbitrary SQL files, but the addition is
where the task uses a map to execute the SQL against a particular database.
made to account for multi-database setups.

author: jmcnally
msg: a patch by Scott Weaver to properly handle StringKey columns with defaults.
I added the NumberKey as well and forward ported a fix for BigDecimal

author: jmcnally
msg: fulcrum's security service was not assigning a value to $targetDatabase
I tried to fix this in fulcrum, but could not.  the security service will
need the $targetDatabase before it will generate code properly for oracle
and other db's that use sequences.

author: dlr
msg: o Added db2400 to list of possible RDBMS types for DB/2 for AS/400.
o Added description of addIntakeRetrievable property.

author: jmcnally
msg: made db.props available to the om/peer generation.  used this to set the
sequence name for oracle in the event the idMethod="native" is used in the
